001
002package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node;
003
004import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.format.IPathFormatter;
005import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IAtomicValuedItem;
006import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IFlagDefinition;
007import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IFlagInstance;
008
009import java.net.URI;
010import java.util.Collection;
011import java.util.Collections;
012import java.util.List;
013import java.util.stream.Stream;
014
015import javax.xml.namespace.QName;
016
017import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
018import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;
019
020/**
021 * A Metapath node valued item representing a Metaschema module flag.
022 */
023
024public interface IFlagNodeItem
025    extends IDefinitionNodeItem<IFlagDefinition, IFlagInstance>, IAtomicValuedItem {
026  @Override
027  default NodeItemType getNodeItemType() {
028    return NodeItemType.FLAG;
029  }
030
031  @Override
032  default IFlagNodeItem getNodeItem() {
033    return this;
034  }
035
036  @Override
037  IFlagDefinition getDefinition();
038
039  @Override
040  IFlagInstance getInstance();
041
042  @Override
043  @Nullable
044  default URI getBaseUri() {
045    INodeItem parent = getParentNodeItem();
046    return parent == null ? null : parent.getBaseUri();
047  }
048
049  /**
050   * FlagContainer do not have flag items. This call should return an empty
051   * collection.
052   */
053  @SuppressWarnings("null")
054  @Override
055  default Collection<? extends IFlagNodeItem> getFlags() {
056    // a flag does not have flags
057    return Collections.emptyList();
058  }
059
060  /**
061   * FlagContainer do not have flag items. This call should return {@code null}.
062   */
063  @Override
064  default IFlagNodeItem getFlagByName(@NonNull QName name) {
065    // a flag does not have flags
066    return null;
067  }
068
069  /**
070   * FlagContainer do not have flag items. This call should return an empty
071   * stream.
072   */
073  @SuppressWarnings("null")
074  @Override
075  default @NonNull
076  Stream<? extends IFlagNodeItem> flags() {
077    // a flag does not have flags
078    return Stream.empty();
079  }
080
081  /**
082   * FlagContainer do not have model items. This call should return an empty
083   * collection.
084   */
085  @SuppressWarnings("null")
086  @Override
087  default @NonNull
088  Collection<? extends List<? extends IModelNodeItem<?, ?>>> getModelItems() {
089    // a flag does not have model items
090    return Collections.emptyList();
091  }
092
093  /**
094   * FlagContainer do not have model items. This call should return an empty list.
095   */
096  @SuppressWarnings("null")
097  @Override
098  default List<? extends IModelNodeItem<?, ?>> getModelItemsByName(QName name) {
099    // a flag does not have model items
100    return Collections.emptyList();
101  }
102
103  /**
104   * FlagContainer do not have model items. This call should return an empty
105   * stream.
106   */
107  @SuppressWarnings("null")
108  @NonNull
109  @Override
110  default Stream<? extends IModelNodeItem<?, ?>> modelItems() {
111    // a flag does not have model items
112    return Stream.empty();
113  }
114
115  @Override
116  default @NonNull
117  String format(@NonNull IPathFormatter formatter) {
118    return formatter.formatFlag(this);
119  }
120
121  @Override
122  default <CONTEXT, RESULT> RESULT accept(@NonNull INodeItemVisitor<CONTEXT, RESULT> visitor, CONTEXT context) {
123    return visitor.visitFlag(this, context);
124  }
125}
